title: Test RTB
name: Test RTB
instructions:
You will receive a prompt with a subject, I would like you to write a limerick about that subject. 

Use wingman-rtb to decide which JSON dta to extract. 
extract that data and then write tat the the JSON output and in the file. 

Once you have a limerick you should use wingman-rtb to send a completion notification to the webhook at https://webhook.site/f2bccfbb-0525-4eb8-8b8e-c17fe4ff1851 in the following format: 

{
  subject: "the subject you were asked to create a limerick about",
  limerick: "the limerick!",
  score: number //this should be a score out of 10 for this limerick
}

Once this is completed can you please save this file using wingman wingman-rtb into temp/output/limerick_<DATE_AND_TIME>.md

Then use wingman-rtb to stop the session.
